creator: stephen.shepherd@pearson.com
text:
I am unable to copy Thread Group elements using the JMeter GUI on my MacBook.

Flow: Create a new thread, add an element, right click the element, select copy. A box appears with the title Error, no text in the box with an OK button. Selecting OK or closing out the box leaves behind a frozen JMeter ui.

Did not see this as a reported bug.

Thanks

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 54648 ***

Hello,
Could you have a look at 54648 and if you are not in the described configuration , reopen it with more details on versions of Mac, Java.

Our problem with this bug is that with my 2 Macs under different versions I was never able to reproduce it.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
